HELB loan repayment is channeled through e-Citizen Repayment Gateway. Please download the Customer Journey Map (https://www.helb.co.ke/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Customer-JourneyMapping.pdf) to follow the steps. 
(Reply with 0 to go back)

You can easily Download your personal statement from the HELB portal (https://portal.hef.co.ke/auth/ signin) OR the HELB Mobile Application.. 
(Reply with 0 to go back)

Upon completion of loan repayment, kindly seek clearance from HELB. Please note that only HELB and not your employer can confirm your loan repayment status. HELB shall confirm loan repayment completion by issuing certificate of clearance. For clearance, please fill in the Loan Recovery Enquiry form.. 
(Reply with 0 to go back)

A penalty of 5% per month is charged on the employer for every deduction that remains unpaid.If you overpay your loan, you will receive a refund from HELB and not your employer. To claim refund, please fill in the Loan Recovery Enquiry form.. 
(Reply with 0 to go back)

You can easily update your personal details from the HELB portal OR the HELB Mobile Application.

Loanee Compliance Certificate (Beneficiaries)This Certificate is issued to the beneficiaries of HELB loan who are up to date with their loan repayment. It is also issued to the beneficiaries who are still within the repayment grace period. Once a beneficiary has completed repaying the loan, he/she is issued Certificate of Clearance. (https://portal.hef.co.ke/auth/signin). This service is not charged.
 Non-Loanee Compliance Certificate (Non-Beneficiaries)If you did not benefit from HELB loan, you can apply for the Non-loanee Compliance Certificate from the HELB Portal (https://portal.hef.co.ke/auth/signin) or e-Citizen Portal (https://accounts.ecitizen.go.ke/en). This service is not charged.
